content: description the cropped grandpa style cardigan you didn t know you needed worked up with beginner friendly stitches and shaping you ll have it done in no time perfect to layer over dresses or high waisted jeans the carl cardigan is free on my blog 1 the carl cardigan is available as a kit with lion brand 2 the kit comes with all the yarn needed + the pdf digital download of the pattern the carl cardigan is available as a full video tutorial 3 on my youtube channel 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/the-carl-cardigan-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //shrsl com/384jd 3 https //youtu be/f86hjmetlby
